title: Nasscom Technology & Leadership Forum 2025
description: Tech-driven insights combined with leadership, pushing forward India's tech future.

title: Bengaluru Tech Summit 2024
description: Asia's most prestigious technology summit with a focus on innovation across multiple sectors.

title: hackCBS 7.0
description: India's largest student-run hackathon, featuring open-source development and community building.

title: IndiaFOSS 2024
description: A focused conference on Free and Open Source Software, organized by FOSS United.

title: Flutter Conf India 2023
description: Dive deep into Dart and Flutter at this leading conference dedicated to top-quality content.

title: CYBERX INDIA ROADSHOW 2023
description: Join over 200+ leading cybersecurity experts for insightful discussions on the latest trends.

title: Devcon 7, 2024
description: Join the global community at Devcon, the foremost Ethereum conference, dedicated to in-depth discussions, innovation, and networking within the blockchain and Ethereum ecosystem.

title: Open Source India 2024
description: Explore the vibrant world of open source at Open Source India, the premier conference for engaging with cutting-edge open source technology and leading community experts.

title: International Conference on Soft Computing: Theories and Applications
description: The aim of the conference is to highlight the latest advances, problems and challenges and to present the latest research results in the field of soft computing with a link to scientific research and its practical implementation.

title: Latitude59 Kenya Edition 2024
description: Join us for the Latitude59 Global Village event, a vibrant gathering of tech enthusiasts, startups, and innovators from around the world. This November, Latitude59 collaborates with Tech Safari to foster connections within the international tech community and explore opportunities in East Africa. This event will feature inspiring talks, networking opportunities, and discussions on the latest trends in technology and entrepreneurship. Be part of this unique experience, share ideas, and help shape the future of tech in Africa and beyond!

title: AI Reality Tour Mumbai
description: This year’s AI Reality Tour is making a stop in Mumbai, where you will learn how your organisation can leverage the latest advancements in AI to maximise the value of your data

title: Priority Hackfest 2024
description: We’re calling on individuals with 3+ years of Technical Industry experience—whether you prefer to compete solo or form a team of up to 3. And don't forget your laptop

title: Innovating with AI: Insights into Gemma, Gemini AI, and Google’s AI Landscape
description: Hear from industry experts, covering the latest in AI, machine learning, web development, and must-have developer tools.

title: Innova 2024 Delhi NCR
description: Prepare to be part of a dazzling whirlwind of innovation and inspiration — where the future of technology unfolds before your eyes!

title: DevFest Noida 2024
description: Our flagship annual fest, DevFest Noida, is the ultimate celebration of technology, bringing together professionals and students, communities and leaders, tech giants, and emerging startups, to foster deeper connections with technology as well as one another.

title: DevFest 2024 Gurugram
description: Hear from renowned experts in AI ethics and technology who will share their insights on responsible AI practices.

title: Bengaluru Blockchain/ICP Dev. workshop
description: Hands-on workshop on Blockchain Development with the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) This workshop is designed to take you step-by-step through the process of building and deploying decentralized projects on the ICP blockchain. Whether you’re new to blockchain or want to expand your skills, this workshop offers everything you need—from setting up your development environment to launching your project on the ICP mainnet.

title: ROAD TO #IBW2024 - NEW DELHI EDITION - VERSEATILE X IBW2024
description: Join us for an exclusive evening powered by IBW2024 and VERSEATILE. The #R2IBW24 Event is your perfect space to meet professionals seeking to network, collaborate and partner up!

title: Sigma: Sync & Sprint
description: Join a private gathering of high-signal Sigmas, who are eager to take that crucial step and build for everyone, not just for a specific chain!​Limited to a few carefully selected individuals, this event promises an intimate and focused environment to push you forward into the Sprint!

title: India Blockchain Week (IBW) Conference 2024
description: Elevate your India Blockchain Week experience with the IBW2024 Conference hosted at the Sheraton Grand, Bangalore on December 4-5, 2024. The IBW2024 Conference is the two-day headline event anchoring India Blockchain Week (IBW), crafted by Hashed Emergent, a team and brand dedicated to accelerating the mass adoption of web3 in India. Amplifying the discourse on blockchain and its myriad potential, the IBW2024 Conference offers a unique blend of invaluable key-note speeches, expert dialogues, dynamic panel discussions, and unparalleled networking opportunities.

title: ROAD TO DevCon: Delhi Edition
description: Join us for a beginner-friendly meetup to kickstart your blockchain journey and explore the importance of decentralization 😇
